revision.text:
'''Government-organized demonstrations''' or '''state demonstrations''' are [[demonstration (people)|demonstrations]] which are organized by the government of that nation. The [[Islamic Republic of Iran]],[http://www.rferl.org/featuresarticle/2004/11/9965bfb5-1917-4d01-a7b7-19d5de7692cd.html Analysis: Iran Sends Terror-Group Supporters To Arafat's Funeral Procession] "...state-organized rallies..."[http://www.thehedgefundjournal.com/commentary/index.php?articleid=23056981 Why Washington and Tehran are headed for a showdown] ''the hedgefund journal'' 16 April 2006 the [[People's Republic of China]],[http://lists.asu.edu/cgi-bin/wa?A2=ind9905e&L=china-nn&P=173 Global News, No. GL99-072] ''C h i n a N e w s D i g e s t'' June 3, 1989 [[Republic of Cuba]],[http://www.washtimes.com/world/20060802-124603-7186r.htm Cubans ponder life without Fidel] ''THE WASHINGTON TIMES'' 2 August 2006 the [[Soviet Union]],[http://www.pinr.com/report.php?ac=view_report&report_id=249&language_id=1 "Democracy in the Former Soviet Union: 1991-2004"] ''Power and Interest News Report'' 28 December 2004 [[Kirchnerism|Kirchnerist]] [[Argentina]],{{cite web |url= http://www.clarin.com/zona/Militancia-terreno_0_745725575.html|title= Militancia todo terreno: Sacan a presos de la cárcel para actos del kirchnerismo|trans_title= All-terrain militants: Prisoners are taken out of jail to take part in Kirchnerist demonstrations|language= Spanish|author= Nicolás Pizzi|date= 29/07/2012|work= |publisher= Clarín|accessdate=July 29, 2012}} [[Kingdom of Italy (1861–1946)|Fascist Italy]], and [[Kristallnacht|Nazi Germany]] among other nations, have had government-organized demonstrations. In Iran, demonstrations such as the anniversary of [[Islamic revolution]], are organized by government. In the past, people at these demonstrations have chanted "Down with Israel" and "Death to America" .[http://seattletimes.nwsource.com/html/nationworld/2003136464_mideast19.html The Seattle Times: Nation & World: Israel, Hezbollah continue attacks][http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline//shows/tehran/axis/nafisi.html How should Americans understand phrases like "Death to America" and "Great Satan"?] ''PBS'', an interview with [[Azar Nafisi]] The North Korean government regularly organizes demonstrations against South Korea or the US or in support of government policies. ==See also== * [[Mass games]] ==References==
